SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT046
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message causes the system to generate a list of all undelivered messages input by the sending LT, or by all LTs belonging to the requester's destination. The response to this message is an MT 066 Solicited Undelivered Message Report.
From: User To: FIN

SystemField.Name: lt-code
SystemField.description: 9th character of BIC-12. The value X signifies details of all LTs belonging to the destination.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: lt-code
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: 9th character of BIC-12. The value X signifies details of all LTs belonging to the destination.

SystemField.Name: reporting-options
SystemField.description:
Reporting Options, where:
a) RT = all undelivered at report time
b) nn = undelivered for more than nn hours (range: 00 < nn < 24)
c) VD = value-date-sensitive message undelivered after the Receiver's cut-off time on the value date.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: reporting-options
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Reporting Options, where:
a) RT = all undelivered at report time
b) nn = undelivered for more than nn hours (range: 00 < nn < 24)
c) VD = value-date-sensitive message undelivered after the Receiver's cut-off time on the value date.
